lom:description.lom:string: The article in the Winter 2006 edition of the AWIS (American Women in Science) Magazine (vol. 33, no. 1, pp. 33-34) provides commentary on a number of recent reports calling America to action to address isssues related to the nation's scientific and technological enterprise. It cites the National Academies report "Raising Above the Gathering Storm" and the "Engineer 2020" report among others.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Yellowstone National Park, eruption prediction, hydrothermal phenomena, geysers,

lom:title.lom:string: Science, Technology and theScience, Technology and the Global Economy
